entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chetwynd Airport 06:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -24.7°C
Pressure: 104.3 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -29.1°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow near the Rockies this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h near noon. High minus 12.
